title: Easy highway access, Dishwashers available in select homes
posting_body: ['Virtual and Contact-Free Leasing and Move-In Available', '- Self-Guided Tours with Lockboxes', '- FaceTime/Skype Tours', '- Apply & Sign Online', 'President Madison Apartments', '31597 Harlo Drive, Madison Heights, MI, 48071', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 57', 'OR Text', '57', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'Madison Heights Apartments', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 820 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'BRAND NEW COMMUNITY CENTER featuring an expansive Social Gathering Room, fitness center with state-of-the-art fitness equipment and flat screen televisions and a beautifully designed outdoor pool.', 'Our terrific location makes it easy for residents to walk or drive to some of the most entertaining parts of our city.', 'Pop into Birmingham for the day, relax and enjoy some family time at Halmich Park or just take your dog on a walk to the nearby dog park.', 'Anywhere you want to go is easily accessible and within just a few minutes drive from your front door.', 'Inside our East Madison Heights apartments, residents are happy to find upgraded countertops and cabinets, name brand appliances, including gas stoves, individual heating and cooling systems and even ceramic and hardwood flooring and dishwashers in select homes.', 'Our heated hallways and mail box areas will keep those cold MI winters at bay and modern conveniences like an on-site laundry facility, friendly management staff and online payments make living here a breeze.', 'In addition to our spacious one and two bedroom floor plans, President Madison Apartments also offers temporary lease agreements for those visitors or business people who don’t want to spend all of their time in the confines of a hotel.', 'Our well-appointed, furnished apartments provide a tranquil retreat when visiting Madison Heights.', 'Pet Policy', 'President Madison offers pet friendly apartments in Madison Heights and welcomes both cats in all apartments and dogs in select apartments.', "You'll find beautiful green spaces where your pet dog can run and play.", 'In addition, your dog can run free and meet new friends at the nearby Red Oak Dog Park.', 'We are one of the few communities in the area to welcome your large dog!', 'We have a limit of 2 pets under 25 lbs each or one large pet without a weight limit.', 'Some breed restrictions apply.', "We're confident your pet will love living at President Madison as much as our human neighbors do!", 'Driving Directions:', 'From I-75N:', 'Exit at 12 Mile Rd.', 'and turn right.', 'Turn left at John R Rd.', "Pass 13 Mille and you will see Sam's Club on your right.", "Turn right at the first street after Sam's Club (Irving).", 'Turn left at the next main street, Harlo.', 'President Madison Apartments is in the apartment building 31597 with a blue and white sign in front.', 'From I-75S:', 'Exit at 14 Mile Rd. and turn left.', 'Turn right at John R Rd.', 'Turn left at Whitcomb (7-11 and target).', 'Turn right at the next main street, Harlo.', 'President Madison Apartments is in the apartment building 31597 with a blue and white sign in front.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-6:00PM', 'CQ5x3YIk']
